UserRegister.title: Welcome
UserRegister.subtitle: Let's set up your profile to start working out.
UserRegister.noUsers: No users found. Create the first one!

Exercises.chest_bench_press_desc: The fundamental exercise for strength and mass of the mid-chest.
Exercises.chest_incline_dumbbell_press_desc: Excellent for developing the upper chest with a greater range of motion.
Exercises.chest_push_up_desc: Classic bodyweight exercise for endurance and muscle control.
Exercises.chest_cable_fly_desc: Maintains constant tension on the chest throughout the entire movement.
Exercises.chest_dips_desc: Focused on the lower chest and pushing power.
Exercises.chest_decline_bench_press_desc: Emphasizes the lower chest and allows for heavier loads.
Exercises.chest_dumbbell_fly_desc: Promotes a great stretch of the chest muscle fibers.
Exercises.chest_machine_chest_press_desc: Provides stability to focus purely on chest contraction.
Exercises.chest_pec_deck_desc: Ideal mechanical isolation for targeting the inner chest.
Exercises.chest_dumbbell_pullover_desc: Helps expand the ribcage and targets the serratus and lower chest.
Exercises.chest_incline_barbell_press_desc: Total focus on strength in the upper portion of the chest.
Exercises.chest_low_to_high_cable_fly_desc: Specifically targets the upper chest and clavicular fibers.
Exercises.back_pull_up_desc: The best exercise for back width and functional strength.
Exercises.back_lat_pulldown_desc: Excellent for isolating the latissimus dorsi and controlling the load.
Exercises.back_barbell_row_desc: Compound exercise focused on back thickness and density.
Exercises.back_seated_row_desc: Works the central part of the back and rhomboids safely.
Exercises.back_single_arm_db_row_desc: Corrects asymmetries and allows a large range of motion.
Exercises.back_deadlift_desc: Total body strength exercise that works the entire posterior chain.
Exercises.legs_barbell_back_squat_desc: The king of leg exercises, essential for total strength and hypertrophy.
Exercises.legs_front_squat_desc: Variation that prioritizes quad activation and demands an upright posture.
Exercises.legs_leg_press_45_desc: Excellent for muscle volume with safety and load control.
Exercises.legs_hack_squat_desc: Intense focus on the quadriceps, allowing for great depth.
Exercises.legs_leg_extension_desc: Pure quadriceps isolation, ideal for definition and muscle detail.
Exercises.legs_walking_lunge_desc: Works balance and coordination, focusing on glutes and quads.
Exercises.legs_bulgarian_split_squat_desc: Intense unilateral challenge that fixes asymmetries and targets glutes.
Exercises.legs_stiff_leg_deadlift_desc: Focused on maximum stretching and strengthening of the hamstrings.
Exercises.legs_lying_leg_curl_desc: Isolates the hamstrings through knee flexion while lying down.
Exercises.legs_seated_leg_curl_desc: Isolates the hamstrings with better lumbar stability.
Exercises.legs_hip_thrust_desc: The best exercise for building strong and voluminous glutes.
Exercises.legs_sumo_deadlift_desc: Emphasizes adductors and glutes with a wider leg stance.
Exercises.legs_standing_calf_raise_desc: Focuses on the gastrocnemius for thicker calves.
Exercises.legs_seated_calf_raise_desc: Targets the soleus muscle, essential for calf width.
Exercises.legs_goblet_squat_desc: Great for beginners and for improving hip mobility.
Exercises.shoulders_overhead_press_desc: Core strength exercise for building wide and powerful shoulders.
Exercises.shoulders_dumbbell_lateral_raise_desc: The primary exercise for isolating the lateral deltoid and gaining width.
Exercises.shoulders_dumbbell_press_desc: Allows for a greater range of motion and improves individual stability.
Exercises.shoulders_arnold_press_desc: Rotation variation that targets all heads of the deltoid.
Exercises.shoulders_cable_lateral_raise_desc: Maintains constant tension throughout the entire range of motion.
Exercises.shoulders_front_raise_desc: Focused on isolating the anterior (front) deltoid.
Exercises.shoulders_face_pull_desc: Essential for shoulder health and rear deltoid development.
Exercises.shoulders_reverse_fly_desc: Excellent for isolating the back of the shoulders and improving posture.
Exercises.shoulders_upright_row_desc: Works shoulders and traps together in a pulling motion.
Exercises.shoulders_smith_machine_press_desc: Provides extra stability to focus purely on load and muscular effort.
Exercises.shoulders_bent_over_lateral_raise_desc: Dumbbell version focusing on the posterior deltoid.
Exercises.shoulders_machine_lateral_raise_desc: Mechanical isolation ideal for high-intensity techniques like dropsets.
Exercises.arms_barbell_curl_desc: The classic exercise for building biceps volume and strength.
Exercises.arms_dumbbell_curl_desc: Allows focus on each arm individually, correcting asymmetries.
Exercises.arms_hammer_curl_desc: Targets the brachialis and brachioradialis, increasing arm thickness.
Exercises.arms_preacher_curl_desc: Isolates the biceps by eliminating shoulder momentum, focusing on the peak.
Exercises.arms_cable_curl_desc: Provides constant tension throughout the entire contraction phase.
Exercises.arms_incline_db_curl_desc: Maximum stretch of the long head of the biceps for greater range.
Exercises.arms_triceps_pushdown_desc: Fundamental isolation exercise for the back of the arm.
Exercises.arms_skull_crusher_desc: One of the best mass builders for all three triceps heads.
Exercises.arms_overhead_db_extension_desc: Emphasizes the long head of the triceps via overhead stretching.
Exercises.arms_dips_desc: Powerful compound exercise for triceps and pushing strength.
Exercises.arms_close_grip_bench_press_desc: Bench press variation focused on heavy loading for the triceps.
Exercises.arms_rope_pushdown_desc: Allows for a wider flare at the end for maximum contraction.
Exercises.arms_reverse_curl_desc: Works the upper part of the forearm and grip strength.
Exercises.arms_wrist_curl_desc: Focused on developing the forearm flexors.
Exercises.arms_reverse_wrist_curl_desc: Strengthens the wrist extensors and joint stability.
Exercises.core_plank_desc: Fundamental isometric exercise for core stability and full trunk strength.
Exercises.core_crunch_desc: Classic movement to focus on the upper rectus abdominis.
Exercises.core_hanging_leg_raise_desc: Advanced exercise with intense focus on the lower abdominals.
Exercises.core_russian_twist_desc: Works trunk rotation and obliques definition.
Exercises.core_cable_crunch_desc: Allows adding resistance for abdominal hypertrophy (six-pack development).
Exercises.core_ab_wheel_rollout_desc: Intense stability challenge working the entire core and serratus.
Exercises.core_side_plank_desc: Focused on lateral stability and strengthening the obliques.
Exercises.core_bicycle_crunch_desc: Excellent for targeting both the rectus abdominis and obliques simultaneously.
Exercises.core_leg_raise_on_floor_desc: Great for strengthening the lower abs in a controlled manner.
Exercises.core_hyperextension_desc: Strengthens the spinal erectors and supports spine health.
Exercises.core_woodchopper_desc: Functional rotational movement that simulates sports activities.
Exercises.core_dead_bug_desc: Excellent for coordination and deep lumbar stability control.
Exercises.cardio_treadmill_running_desc: Excellent for calorie burning and improving overall cardiovascular fitness.
Exercises.cardio_stationary_bike_desc: Great low-impact option for cardiovascular endurance and fat loss.
Exercises.cardio_elliptical_desc: Provides a full-body workout with nearly zero joint impact.
Exercises.cardio_stair_climber_desc: Simulates climbing stairs, focusing intensely on glutes and legs.
Exercises.cardio_rowing_machine_desc: Full-body exercise combining muscular strength with high energy expenditure.
Exercises.cardio_jump_rope_desc: Powerful tool for agility, coordination, and rapid calorie burning.
Exercises.cardio_burpees_desc: Explosive full-body movement to raise heart rate instantly.
Exercises.cardio_jumping_jacks_desc: Classic warm-up exercise to prepare the body for training.
Exercises.cardio_mountain_climbers_desc: Works core and cardio simultaneously at a fast pace.
Exercises.cardio_battle_ropes_desc: Develops muscular endurance in arms and shoulders with high metabolic demand.
Exercises.cardio_box_jumps_desc: Plyometric exercise for explosive power and aerobic conditioning.
Exercises.cardio_swimming_desc: Total body resistance in a water environment, ideal for recovery and stamina.

WorkoutForm.proTip: You can organize this workout in your weekly calendar on the Agenda screen after saving it.
